richText.data: Fusing functional outerwear and streetwear cool, this anorak jacket is suited to walks in the wilderness or strolls through the city. Crafted in a water-repellent polyester and fitted with a protective hood, it promises to keep you dry - whatever the weather. Styled in a stylish quarter-zip design and fitted with a spacious front pocket, itâ€™s complete with bold silver branding printed on the back.
